get.summary: Get support cases by status, tenant id or user profile id

parameters.name: status
parameters.description: The status of the support case

parameters.name: tenantId
parameters.description: The tenant id

parameters.name: userProfileId
parameters.description: The user profile id, to filter cases created by the user or assignees

parameters.name: createdAfter
parameters.description: Support cases older than this will not be returned

parameters.name: supportCaseId
parameters.description: The support case id

get.summary: Get audit logs by support case id
get.description: Get audit logs by support case id

parameters.name: supportCaseId
parameters.description: The support case id

post.description: Accept support case (tenant should accept the case)

parameters.name: supportCaseId
parameters.description: The support case id

post.description: Reject support case (tenant should reject the case)

parameters.name: supportCaseId
parameters.description: The support case id

post.description: Cancel support case (can be done be either tenant or support)

parameters.name: supportCaseId
parameters.description: The support case id

get.summary: Create credentials for assignee to access the case
get.description: Create credentials for assignee to access the case

parameters.name: supportCaseId
parameters.description: The support case id

parameters.name: alias
parameters.description: Tenant alias. Used as CNAME for tenant, for example tenant with alias extenda is accessable at https://extenda.hiiretail.com

parameters.name: skip
parameters.description: Skip certain number of records

parameters.name: take
parameters.description: Take certain number of records

X-Pagination-Total.description: Total amount of items in collection, example - 100

X-Pagination-Take.description: Max amount of items to take per request, example - 50

X-Pagination-Has-More.description: If true, next call will return non empty array, example - true

get.summary: Gets user group link by id

parameters.name: searchString
parameters.description: searchString only works, when sortBy is selected and searches in `sortBy` field

delete.summary: Unassign role from group by id.

parameters.name: searchString

parameters.name: returnAliases

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Role id must follow the pattern: {systemPrefix}.{role} and contain a-z letters and hyphens where the systemPrefix size is 3 and role is between 2 and 30 characters.

parameters.description: If enabled, response will include email & name. Ð¡an be set only if googleUserId or externalId filter defined

get.description:
Finds a single user by search query.
If more than one user was found 409 is returned.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: User name to search for

parameters.name: userProfileId
parameters.description: Id of user profile to search for

parameters.name: email
parameters.description: User email to search for

get.description: Returns tenant id in firestore and GIP + available identity providers

parameters.name: tenantAlias
parameters.description: Tenant alias

post.summary: Try set primary connection id. If provided id does not match any of the providers or is not provided at all, no changes are made.
Endpoint lets the tenant set default locale. If `defaultLocale` is not passed, default locale will be deleted
Disables/Enables anonymous shopper login. If flag in the body not specified, value will be removed from config & login will be enabled.
Endpoint lets the tenant set default timezone. If `defaultTimezone` is not passed, default timezone will be deleted

get.description:
User profile requires valid IAM token (all other tokens will be rejected),
with the same tenantId, that in path and
does not require any specific permissions.
Behavior of an endpoint depends on token.

put.description:
User profile requires valid IAM token (all other tokens will be rejected),
with the same tenantId, that in path and
does not require any specific permissions.
Behavior of an endpoint depends on token.

User profile requires valid IAM token (all other tokens will be rejected),
with the same tenantId, that in path and
does not require any specific permissions.
Behavior of an endpoint depends on token.

get.summary: Get all permissions for a passed User token

User profile requires valid IAM token (all other tokens will be rejected),
with the same tenantId, that in path and
does not require any specific permissions.
Behavior of an endpoint depends on token.

get.summary: Redirects to IDP logout endpoit if one was configured. Endpoint is publicly available, it only interacts with current user session
get.description:
Redirects to IDP logout endpoit if one was configured.
      If no logout url is configured, 'fallbackRedirectUrl' query param is used.

parameters.name: fallbackRedirectUrl
parameters.description: Fallback url for redirect if federated identity provider logout url is not found.

parameters.name: idProviderConnectionId
parameters.description: Provider Connection ID in IAM API

parameters.name: externalUserId
parameters.description: User id from extrnal identity provider

get.summary: List resources. If `permission` parameter is specified, endpoint will require - valid token that will have `permission` from query (bindings don't matter).

parameters.name: permission
parameters.description: Optional permission to filter resources based on user token

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: Resource type, a prefix in resource id, like - bu, for Business units.

X-Pagination-Total.description: Total amount of items in collection, example - 100

X-Pagination-Take.description: Max amount of items to take per request, example - 50

X-Pagination-Has-More.description: If true, next call will return non empty array, example - true

get.summary: Get a list of external applications.

post.summary: Exchange federated ID token user token for IAM ID token
Exchange email+password for IAM ID token. WARNING: Use of standalone users is not recommended. Be aware, you cannot generate IAM token for the same ID token twice!!
Exchange refresh token user token for IAM ID token
Exchange IAM ID token for custom firebase token. Custom can be used to trigger new auth session with firebase sdk given iam token

access-token.description: JWT Authorization header using the Bearer scheme.

api-key.description: API_KEY Authorization header using the Bearer scheme.

SupportCaseStatus.description: The status of the case. The status can only change from Pending to Accepted or Rejected. It is not possible to change the status from Accepted to Rejected or vice versa.

AccessLevel.description: The access level of the case

createdBy.description: Taken from the auth context - the user who created the case

createdAt.description: The creation date of the case

decidedAt.description: The date of the case last action

decidedBy.description: Taken from the auth context - the user who make a decision on the support case (tanant admin)

assignees.description: The list of user profile ids

id.description: The id of the case audit log

action.description: The action of the case audit log

payload.description: The payload of the case audit log

requester.description: The requester id performing the action

createdAt.description: The creation date of the case audit log. ISO 8601 format

assignees.description: The list of user profile ids

fetchedAt.description: The time it was first fetched. ISO 8601 format

alias.description: Tenant alias. Used as CNAME for tenant, for example tenant with alias extenda is accessable at https://extenda.hiiretail.com

staffTenantId.description: Tenant Id in Google Identity Platform Staff project

isTestTenant.description: If true, this is test tenant, used as test env for prod tenant

userProfileId.description: Id of this user's profile in User Profile service

externalIdpLogoutConfig.description: External IdP logout configuration. Used by the UI to specify how to logout from the external IdP.

prompt.description:
Space delimited, case sensitive list of ASCII string values that specifies
whether the Authorization Server prompts the End-User for reauthentication and consent.
The defined values are: none | login | consent | select_account
For more info see: https://openid.net/specs/openid-connect-core-1_0.html#AuthRequest

defaultLocale.description:
Used to indicate the Tenant's default locale for purposes of localizing such
      items as currency, date time format, or numerical representations.
      The value must be a valid language-tag as defined in [RFC5646](https://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc5646).

defaultTimezone.description: Used to indicate the Tenant's default timezone. The value must be a valid timezone as defined in [tz database](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/List_of_tz_database_time_zones).

nonce.description: Nonce to be used in ID Token validation. Nonce must be unique for every token. Notice that you need to pass original nonce, but token should contain sha256 hash of original nonce
